name: csc.vim
summary: Compiler file for MS C#.  (csc, csc.exe)
description: Use the Microsoft C# compiler from within Vim.  Parses error output from the compiler and populates the quickfix window.
install_details:
Drop csc.vim in c:\vim\vimfiles\compiler and add the following autocommand to your _vimrc:
au BufNewFile,BufRead *.cs compiler csc
